analysis.key_quote: In particular it would be a catastrophic and gargantuan disaster to put political appointees into jobs that generate important information, because we have seen in a large number of well documented cases that political appointees of the current administration both lie and skew reports of facts.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the need to protect civil servants and their skills from politicization, highlighting concerns about the reliability of information generated by political appointees.
